About myself:
I have been living in Lisbon for 6 years, originally from Germany. I practice meditation since 2019. Last year I joined the Triratna Buddhist Community at Agora. Iâ€™m in the first year of the Dharma Training for Mitras, which will be the bases for the meditations.
